com.robindrew.trading.price.candle.indicator.standard

Class SmaIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robindrew.trading.price.candle.indicator.AbstractIndicator
      • com.robindrew.trading.price.candle.indicator.ValueIndicator
        • com.robindrew.trading.price.candle.indicator.standard.SmaIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INamedCloseable, IIndicator, IPriceCandleStreamSink, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SmaIndicator
extends ValueIndicator
    Simple Moving Average (SMA).

    Calculated by adding the closing price of each candle and then dividing the total by the number of time periods.
